lead_paragraph: Formula One announced a deal with the sport's four engine manufacturers on Friday to reduce prices over three years from 2017, ensure all teams are supplied and reduce performance gaps.

headline.print_headline: Formula One Agrees Cheaper Power Units From 2017
headline.main: Formula One Agrees Cheaper Power Units From 2017

snippet: Formula One announced a deal with the sport's four engine manufacturers on Friday to reduce prices over three years from 2017, ensure all teams are supplied and reduce performance gaps....
